Obito grows a large tree from beneath the ground with four flowers that forms four large Tailed Beast Balls. To ensure the balls would not miss, Obito had used [[Six Red Yang Formation]] to contain the blast, although the [[Allied Shinobi Forces]] had [[Flying Thunder God Technique|teleported]] outside the barrier to avoid it. The resultant explosion was strong enough to completely distort the shape of the unbreakable barrier.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the manga and anime, it was named in ''[[Naruto x Boruto: Ninja Voltage]]''.

[[fr:Explosion à Résonance]]
[[pl:Kyōmei Bakuha]]
